snippet: James Cameron and 20th Century Fox said they expected to begin production next year and release the first of three additional films in December 2017.
abstract: James Cameron and 20th Century Fox say that they now expect to make three rather than two sequels to their hit film Avatar; will begin production in 2014 and release first of three films in December 2017.
lead_paragraph: James Cameron and 20th Century Fox said they expected to begin production next year and release the first of three additional films in December 2017.
